name: SearchAnchor
desc: Manages a "search view" route that allows the user to select one of the suggested completions for a search query.

fields.name: isFullScreen
fields.desc: Whether the search view grows to fill the entire screen when the [SearchAnchor] is tapped.

fields.name: searchController
fields.desc: An optional controller that allows opening and closing of the search view from other widgets.

fields.name: viewBuilder
fields.desc: Optional callback to obtain a widget to lay out the suggestion list of the search view.

fields.name: viewLeading
fields.desc: An optional widget to display before the text input field when the search view is open.

fields.name: viewTrailing
fields.desc: An optional widget list to display after the text input field when the search view is open.

fields.name: viewHintText
fields.desc: Text that is displayed when the search bar's input field is empty.

fields.name: viewBackgroundColor
fields.desc: The search view's background fill color.

fields.name: viewElevation
fields.desc: The elevation of the search view's [Material].

fields.name: viewSurfaceTintColor
fields.desc: The surface tint color of the search view's [Material].

fields.name: viewSide
fields.desc: The color and weight of the search view's outline.

fields.name: viewShape
fields.desc: The shape of the search view's underlying [Material].

fields.name: viewBarPadding
fields.desc: The padding to use for the search view's search bar.

fields.name: headerHeight
fields.desc: The height of the search field on the search view.

fields.name: headerTextStyle
fields.desc: The style to use for the text being edited on the search view.

fields.name: headerHintStyle
fields.desc: The style to use for the [viewHintText] on the search view.

fields.name: dividerColor
fields.desc: The color of the divider on the search view.

fields.name: viewConstraints
fields.desc: Optional size constraints for the search view.

fields.name: viewPadding
fields.desc: The padding to use for the search view.

fields.name: shrinkWrap
fields.desc: Whether the search view should shrink-wrap its contents.

fields.name: textCapitalization
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.editableText.textCapitalization}

fields.name: viewOnChanged
fields.desc: Called each time the user modifies the search view's text field.

fields.name: viewOnSubmitted
fields.desc: Called when the user indicates that they are done editing the text in the text field of a search view. Typically this is called when the user presses the enter key.

fields.name: viewOnClose
fields.desc: Called when the search view is closed.

fields.name: viewOnOpen
fields.desc: Called when the search view is opened.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: Called to create a widget which can open a search view route when it is tapped.

fields.name: suggestionsBuilder
fields.desc: Called to get the suggestion list for the search view.

fields.name: textInputAction
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.TextField.textInputAction}

fields.name: keyboardType
fields.desc: The type of action button to use for the keyboard.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Whether or not this widget is currently interactive.
